comments.comment: Puthe oyata loku gamanak thiyenawa oyage hithe adishtanayakuth thiyenawa oya mahana unoth hodai kiyala mm hithanawa. Gihi jeewithe dukak Puthe. Mokada math podikale oyawage ewagema mahana wennath asawak thibba gedarin ewata wirudda una dan e okkoma boda una dan mahana wenna bari unoth aya eka karanna amarui mokada ath dakeemen kiyanne. Oyage kamaththak mokada ammata thaththata pitin wadakaranna bane aniwarayen ekattiyage ashirwade ganna aran oyata kamathi deyak karanna mm mage hithe thibba dewalui jeewithe addakimui ekka kiwwe. Hoda gamanak yanna asirwada karanawa.
